local mfl, mce = math.floor, math.ceil
local bls, brs = bit.lshift, bit.rshift

local n = io.read("*n", "*l")
-- local n = 12
local tot = 3^n

local warp = {{}}
for i = 1, tot do
  local src = i - 1
  local tmp = src
  local dst = 0
  local mul = 1
  for j = 1, n do
    if src % 3 ~= 0 then
      dst = dst + mul * (3 - (src % 3))
    end
    mul = mul * 3
    src = mfl(src / 3)
  end
  warp[1][i] = dst + 1
end
local lim = 49
for iz = 2, lim + 1 do
  warp[iz] = {}
  for i = 1, tot do
    local src = i == tot and 1 or i + 1
    warp[iz][i] = warp[iz - 1][src]
  end
end
local cur = {}
for i = 1, tot do cur[i] = i end

local function walk(r)
  for i = 1, tot do
    local v = cur[i] + r
    while tot < v do v = v - tot end
    cur[i] = v
  end
end

      cur[i] = warp[rlen + 1][cur[i]]
    end

  else
    rlen = rlen + 1
  end
end
if rlen ~= 0 then

end
for i = 1, tot do

end
print(table.concat(cur, " "))

N.times do |i|
  nt = [[]] * c
  c.times do |j|
    x = j / 3**i
    pre = j - x*c/3
    nxt = []
    ts[pre].each do |q|
      if q
        x = 3 - x if x != 0
        if nxt.length >= 1 && nxt[-1] == 0
          nxt.pop
        else
          nxt << true
        end
      else
        x += 1
        if x == 3
          x = 0
          nxt << false
        end
      end
    end
    j.step(3**N - 1, c) do |k|
      ans[k] += x*c/3
    end
    nt[j] = nxt
  end
  ts = nt
  c *= 3
  end

        next_arr[0] = arr[0]

            next if ordered.include?(ind)
            target = salsa(ind)
            next_arr[target] = arr[ind]

            ordered << target

        next_arr = [tmp] + arr
    end

<?php
// https://atcoder.jp/contests/practice/tasks/practice_1
list($N) = $stream->readLine('%d');
list($T) = $stream->readLine('%s');

$N = pow(3, $N);

// 
$T = str_replace('SS', '', $T);

$P = [];
$C = [];
for ($n = 0; $n < $N; ++$n) {
    $P[] = $n;
    $C[] = (int)base_convert(str_replace([1, 2, 3], [3, 1, 2], base_convert($n, 10, 3)), 3, 10);
}

for ($i = 0, $j = strlen($T); $i < $j; ++$i) {
    if ($T[$i] == 'S') {
        $Q = $P;
        for ($n = 0; $n < $N; ++$n) {
            $Q[$C[$n]] = $P[$n];
        }
        $P = $Q;
    } else { // 'R'
        $k = strpos($T, 'S', $i);
        if ($k === false) {
            $k = $i + 1;
        }
        $t = $i - $k;
        $P = array_merge(array_slice($P, $t), array_slice($P, 0, $t));
        $i = $k - 1;
    }
}

$Q = $P;
for ($n = 0; $n < $N; ++$n) {
    $Q[$P[$n]] = $n;
}
$P = $Q;

$stream->writeLine(implode(' ', $P));

<?php

class AtCoderStream
{
    public function readLine($format)
    {
        return fscanf(STDIN, $format);
    }

    public function writeLine($format)
    {
        echo $format, "\n";
    }
}

// export
$stream = new AtCoderStream();

// https://atcoder.jp/contests/practice/tasks/practice_1
list($N) = $stream->readLine('%d');
list($T) = $stream->readLine('%s');

$N = pow(3, $N);

// 
$T = str_replace('SS', '', $T);

$P = [];
$C = [];
for ($n = 0; $n < $N; ++$n) {
    $P[] = $n;
    $C[] = (int)base_convert(str_replace([1, 2, 3], [3, 1, 2], base_convert($n, 10, 3)), 3, 10);
}

for ($i = 0, $j = strlen($T); $i < $j; ++$i) {
    if ($T[$i] == 'S') {
        $Q = $P;
        for ($n = 0; $n < $N; ++$n) {
            $Q[$C[$n]] = $P[$n];
        }
        $P = $Q;
	    $stream->writeLine('S:' . implode(' ', $P));
    } else { // 'R'
        $k = strpos($T, 'S', $i);
        if ($k === false) {
            $k = $i + 1;
        }
        $t = $i - $k;
        $P = array_merge(array_slice($P, $t), array_slice($P, 0, $t));
        $i = $k - 1;
    	$stream->writeLine('R:' . implode(' ', $P));
    }
}

$Q = $P;
for ($n = 0; $n < $N; ++$n) {
    $Q[$P[$n]] = $n;
}
$P = $Q;

$stream->writeLine(implode(' ', $P));

    $ps = salsa($ps);

    $ps = rumba($ps);
  }

}

$ps = array_reverse($ps);

echo implode(' ', $keys);

function salsa($ps)
{
  $array = array();

  $i = count($ps);
  foreach ($ps as $k => $v) {
    --$i;

    $tmp = base_convert($i, 10, 3);
    $tmp = str_replace('1', 'a', $tmp);
    $tmp = str_replace('2', 'b', $tmp);
    $tmp = str_replace('a', '2', $tmp);
    $tmp = str_replace('b', '1', $tmp);
    $tmp = base_convert($tmp, 3, 10);
    $array[$tmp] = $v;

    // switch ($k % 3) {
    //   case 0:
    //     $array[$k+1] = $v;
    //     break;
    //   case 1:
    //     $array[$k-1] = $v;
    //     break;
    //   case 2:
    //     $array[] = $v;
    //     break;
    // }
  }
  krsort($array);

  return $array;
}

function rumba($ps)
{
  $ps[] = current($ps);
  unset($ps[0]);

  return $ps;
}

import sys
import numpy as np
from numba import njit


@njit('i8[:](i8, i8[:])')
def P_change(N, P):
    #Salsa
    for i in range(N):
        start = 3 ** i
        stop = 3 ** N
        step = 3 ** (i + 1)
        dp = 3 ** i
        for j in range(start, stop, step):
            P[j:j + dp], P[j + dp:j + dp * 2] = P[j + dp:j + dp * 2].copy(), P[j:j + dp].copy()
    
    return P


@njit('i8[:](i8[:])')
def P_slide(P):
    #Rumba
    temp = P[-1]
    P[1:] = P[:-1]
    P[0] = temp

    return P


@njit('i8[:](i8, b1[:], i8[:])')
def dance(N, D, P):
    for Dn in D:
        if Dn:
            #Salsa
            P = P_change(N, P)
        else:
            #Rumba
            P = P_slide(P)

    N3 = 3 ** N
    R = np.zeros(N3, dtype=np.int64)
    for i in range(N3):
        R[P[i]] = i

    return  R

mem = 3**N

  # +1
  pos = np.roll(pos,i)
  return pos
def s(i, pos):
  if i!=0:
    pos = pos.reshape(reshape_tuple)
    for i in range(N):
      pos = np.rollaxis(pos,N-1)[[0,2,1]]
    pos = pos.flatten()
    return pos
  else:
    return pos

    pos = r(d, pos)
    is_r = False
  else:
    pos = s(d, pos)
    is_r = True

            P[j:j1], P[j1:j2] = P[j1:j2], P[j:j1].copy()

    return P

import sys


def P_change(N, Pos):
    #Salsa
    Pos1 = 0
    for Ni in range(N, 0, -1):
        Ni3 = 3 ** (Ni - 1)

        div, Pos = divmod(Pos, Ni3)

        if div == 1:
            Pos1 += Ni3 * 2
        elif div == 2:
            Pos1 += Ni3
        else:
            Pos1 += 0

        if Pos == 0:
            break

    return Pos1 + Pos


def P_slide(N3, Pos):
    #Rumba
    Pos1 = Pos + 1
    if Pos1 == N3:
        Pos1 = 0

    return Pos1

    N3 = 3 ** N
    P = [0] * N3

    for Pos in range(N3):
        Pi = Pos
        for Dn in D:
            if Dn:
                #Salsa
                Pi = P_change(N, Pi)
            else:
                #Rumba
                Pi = P_slide(N3, Pi)
        P[Pos] = Pi

    return  P

import sys


def P_change(N, P):
    #Salsa
    for i in range(N):
        start = 3 ** i
        stop = 3 ** N
        step = 3 ** (i + 1)
        dp = 3 ** i
        for j in range(start, stop, step):
            j1 = j + dp
            j2 = j1 + dp
            Pb = P[j:j1]
            P[j:j1] = P[j1:j2]
            P[j1:j2] = Pb

    return P


def P_slide(P):
    #Rumba
    temp = P[-1]
    P[1:] = P[:-1]
    P[0] = temp

    return P

    #
    T = T.replace('SS', '')

    N3 = 3 ** N
    P = list(range(N3))

    for Dn in D:
        if Dn:
            #Salsa
            P = P_change(N, P)
        else:
            #Rumba
            P = P_slide(P)

    R = [0] * N3
    for i in range(N3):
        R[P[i]] = i

    return  R

import numpy as np
from numba import njit

read = sys.stdin.buffer.read
readline = sys.stdin.buffer.readline
readlines = sys.stdin.buffer.readlines

@njit('(i8,i4[::1])', cache=True)
def solve(dep, T):
    if dep == 0:
        return np.array([0], np.int32)
    A = np.empty(3**dep, np.int32)
    for d in range(3):
        TT = np.empty_like(T)
        p = 0
        x = d
        for t in T:
            if t == 0:
                x = 3 - x if x else 0
                if p > 0 and TT[p - 1] == 0:
                    p -= 1
                else:
                    TT[p] = 0
                    p += 1
            else:
                x = x + 1
                if x == 3:
                    x = 0
                    TT[p] = 1
                    p += 1
        TT = TT[:p]
        A[d::3] = 3 * solve(dep - 1, TT) + x
    return A

import sys
import numpy

s2nn = lambda s: [int(c) for c in s.split(' ')]
ss2nn = lambda ss: [int(s) for s in list(ss)]
ss2nnn = lambda ss: [s2nn(s) for s in list(ss)]
i2s = lambda: sys.stdin.readline().rstrip()
i2n = lambda: int(i2s())
i2nn = lambda: s2nn(i2s())
ii2ss = lambda n: [i2s() for _ in range(n)]
ii2nn = lambda n: ss2nn(ii2ss(n))
ii2nnn = lambda n: ss2nnn(ii2ss(n))


def main():
    N = i2n()
    M = 3**N
    T = i2s()
    trs = str.maketrans({'1': '2', '2': '1'})
    # sls_trans = [lambda n: int(numpy.base_repr(n, 3).translate(trs), base=3) for n in range(M)]
    A = list(range(M))
    for t in T:
        if t == 'S':
            for i in range(M):
                A[i] = int(numpy.base_repr(A[i], 3).translate(trs), base=3)

import sys


def P_change(N, P):
    #Salsa
    for i in range(N):
        start = 3 ** i
        stop = 3 ** N
        step = 3 ** (i + 1)
        dp = 3 ** i
        for j in range(start, stop, step):
            P[j:j + dp], P[j + dp:j + dp * 2] = P[j + dp:j + dp * 2], P[j:j + dp]

    return P


def P_slide(P):

    temp = P[-1]

            P = P_slide(P)

    N3 = 3 ** N
    R = [0] * N3
    for i in range(N3):
        R[P[i]] = i

    return  R

@lru_cache()
def P_change(N, Pos):
    #Salsa
    Pos1 = 0
    for Ni in range(N, 0, -1):
        Ni3 = 3 ** (Ni - 1)

        div, Pos = divmod(Pos, Ni3)

        if div == 1:
            Pos1 += Ni3 * 2
        elif div == 2:
            Pos1 += Ni3
        else:
            Pos1 += 0

        if Pos == 0:
            break

    return Pos1 + Pos

import numpy as np
#from copy import deepcopy
from collections import deque
def run():
    N = int(input())
    T = deque(list(input()))

    def base10to(n, b):#modified
        dic = {'1':'2','2':'1', '0':'0'}
        if (int(n / b)):
            return base10to(int(n / b), b) + dic[str(n % b)]
        return dic[str(n % b)]

    def base10from(num, b):
        n = 0
        numlist = list(num);
        while (numlist):
            n *= b
            n += int(numlist.pop(0))
        return n

    perm_S = [0] * (3 ** N)
    done = [0] * (3 ** N)

    for i in range(1, 3 ** N):
        if not done[i]:
            tmp = base10to(i, 3)
            tmp = base10from(tmp, 3)
            perm_S[i] = tmp
            perm_S[tmp] = i
            done[i], done[tmp] = 1, 1

    perm_S = np.array(perm_S)

    perm_R = deque([i for i in range(0, 3 ** N - 1)])
    perm_R.appendleft(3**N-1)
    perm_R = np.array(perm_R)

    new_list = deque([])
    dic = {'S':perm_S, 'R':perm_R}
    while T:
        if len(T) == 1:
            tmp1 = T.pop()
            new_list.append(dic[tmp1][:])
            continue
        tmp1 = T.popleft()
        tmp2 = T.popleft()
        new_list.append(dic[tmp1][dic[tmp2]])


    while True:
        next_list = new_list.copy()
        new_list = deque([])
        while next_list:
            if len(next_list) == 1:
                tmp1 = next_list.pop()
                new_list.append(tmp1)
                continue
            tmp1 = next_list.popleft()
            tmp2 = next_list.popleft()
            new_list.append(tmp1[tmp2])
        if len(new_list) == 1:break
    val = np.argsort(new_list[0])
    print(' '.join([str(s) for s in val]))


if __name__ == "__main__":
    run()

#Salsa
def P_change(N, P):
    for i in range(N):
        start = 3 ** i
        step = 3 ** (i + 1)
        dp = 3 ** i
        for j in range(start, 3 ** N, step):
            P[j:j + dp], P[j + dp:j + dp * 2] = P[j + dp:j + dp * 2], P[j:j + dp]
    
    return P


#Rumba
def P_slide(P):
    temp = P[-1]
    P[1:] = P[:-1]
    P[0] = temp

    return P

    if Ti == 'S':
        P = P_change(N, P)
    elif Ti == 'R':
        P = P_slide(P)

print(' '.join([str(P.index(i)) for i in range(len(P))]))

import sys
from functools import lru_cache

readline = sys.stdin.readline

@lru_cache()
def P_change(N, Pos):
    #Salsa
    Pos1 = 0
    for Ni in range(N, 0, -1):
        Ni3 = 3 ** (Ni - 1)

        div, Pos = divmod(Pos, Ni3)

        if div == 1:
            Pos1 += Ni3 * 2
        elif div == 2:
            Pos1 += Ni3
        else:
            Pos1 += 0

        if Pos == 0:
            break

    return Pos1 + Pos

        p += 1
    else:
